website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice, even though it is on the small side.
pros: Easy to carry and empty, too
Small enough to hide in kitchen
cons: A little on the small side and uses two filters
Comes with no replacement filters, but new ones are inexpensive

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Larger than expect but perfect. We have been composting for a number of years and we were using old plastic coffee containers. This looks great on my kitchen counter and holds enough so we are running back and forth to the compost. The only improvement I would like to see made, is an easy way of putting in the charcoal filters. We haven't had to change them yet, but I have read the other reviews and the questions about the product and it seems a little weird. I am sure I will figure it out!!
customer_reviews.author: Lovinglife

customer_reviews.title: Composting made easy
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience of having this in my sink for kitchen scraps. It is light weight and easy to clean but best of all with its charcoal filter it allows me time to fill it up and then dump it in the compost pile in the garden. Thanks great product
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: What A Great Pail
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this kitchen compost pail! What a great "chicken" scraps bucket. No odor, easy to clean. Very well made and exceeded my expectations. Speedy delivery also!
customer_reviews.author: C Mills

customer_reviews.title: Large enough to use for a week (for me) without emptying. And looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great find for me. I love its size and it perfectly matches me kitchen fixtures. It is extremely easy to clean and there is absolutely no odor from the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki McManuels

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great design
customer_reviews.text: This compost container is sturdier and easier to clean than the one I purchased previously at a higher price. Looks great on the kitchen counter! The only one I could find that is brushed stainless steel, rather than shiny; and with smooth sides, rather than ribbed. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, looks nice in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, looks nice in the kitchen, easy to use/clean. Measurements are slightly off compared to what is stated below and it is actually a hair taller which meant it would not fit under my kitchen counter against the back splash, but I find another spot in the kitchen and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Was afraid this might be cheap, thin steel but it has good weight and thickness. Handle also is solid and thick. Easy to clean and works great as a kitchen compost bin.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bin for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Like many other people who’ve left comments, I don’t see how I’ll be able to remove and replace the filter. Or even what kind to use, since this comes with no information or instructions at all. I also agree that it’s misleading to say it comes with 2 filters. I do think it’s a pretty bin, and there’s been no odor or bugs so far.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Attractive compost container
customer_reviews.text: This an attractive compost container; looks great with other stainless steel appliances. It holds quite a bit of veg waste. This is used in kitchen; we empty it into a larger outside bin every few days or so.
customer_reviews.author: TrykaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Using this next to the sink for composting. Just the size. Holds a lot. Deodorizer pad in lid works good, no odor
customer_reviews.author: Helen Joanne Helgeson  8/16

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor compost keeper
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on the counter, no smells or fruit flies, and the filters are not that harder to get out.
customer_reviews.author: CD4liberty

customer_reviews.title: Great bio bin that contains the smell perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great bio bin! It’s pretty easy to clean, the top has 2 layers of fabric on the inside that you can take out and clean the lid! It contains the smell perfectly! We’ve been using it for 2 months so I didn’t rate durability, but it looks like it will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Countertop Compost Pail
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase — it's small enough to take up not much space, and the charcoal filter truly controls the smell. I didn't empty my pail all week, and I didn't sniff anything malodorous. I line it with a plastic bag to keep it clean, and it holds quite a bit. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this--mainly use it for coffee grounds
customer_reviews.text: I like this--mainly use it for coffee grounds. Just keep in mind that even though it's stainless steel, it can still corrode. I use a small trash can liner prevent this. One comment: I see that you can order replacement charcoal filters, but I can't figure out how to change them. The retaining ring (on the inside of the lid) that holds the filters in place doesn't budge...
customer_reviews.author: Rex E. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great compost bin
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this compost bin, the carbon filter works great. No odor!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Compost Pail
customer_reviews.text: This temp mulch container is exactly what we were looking for. It is handy and good looking to find its place on the kitchen counter. The lid with charcoal filters eliminate the smell of the mulch that hasn't been transferred to the large mulch pile/container and the gnats are gone. Mission accomplished. :)
customer_reviews.author: DarlH

customer_reviews.title: Classic stainless is great.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for as a counter top composter. Large enough to hold quite a bit of refuse, but not so large as to overwhelm the kitchen counter. The in-lid carbon filter is great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Author Denise Kawaii

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to kitchen. Well-made and functional. The charcoal feature which I really didn’t want actually seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this item because I do not normally put out ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I do not use it for composting, I absolutely love this item because I do not normally put out a large amount of waste so the larger trash cans do not work for the household. This is a great addition to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Got a for a little less than the other identical bins out there. Looks good and matched the kitchen decor. A little bigger than I thought but I found a good spot for it nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Amarillo by morning

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was always using a plastic bowl to put scraps in. This works great! No odor and you don’t see the scraps!
customer_reviews.author: joanie jorn

customer_reviews.title: It's small.
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up to people. This is small little pail. Be prepared to empty it every two to three days if you do some moderate to serious cooking. But otherwise it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for almost 2 years and still love it - cute, clean, handy & sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for the plastic bin we were using. Doesn't smell, sorry we waited so long to buy. Highly recommend if you compost
customer_reviews.author: patti

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in timely fashion. Larger than I had envisioned it but as described. Used it for almost 2 months now and odor free.
customer_reviews.author: Adair Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! No odor. So convenient . Fits on counter and is aesthetically pleasing to the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Klein

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Way easy to clean, holds a lot. keeps the smell out of the kitchen. Handle is stable and long enough for carrying to the outside compost pile
customer_reviews.author: Kitsshirl

customer_reviews.title: Good & doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and it does not leak like the welded compost pail I bought before, which I had to return because it leaked.
customer_reviews.author: EarOne

customer_reviews.title: Great compost bin
customer_reviews.text: I've had so many ceramic compost crocjs but never again. This is nice and big, no smell, easy to clean and looks nice in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Countertop Scrap Bin
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift to my daughter, who saw mine. Perfect for food scraps in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: F. D. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my son. He uses it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He uses it every day as he has a garden and uses all of it for planting.
customer_reviews.author: CatB92

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!! Its a must have.
customer_reviews.text: Love my composting bin wish I got one sooner. No mess with bags and no smell as the filters work great, also have never had flies with food in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Leichsenring

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Useful
customer_reviews.text: This works just fine next to our sink. It is larger than the stainless steel bucket we had to replace because it leaked, and the steel is thicker so it doesn't leak. I'd have preferred one without filters and holes, but they do not seem to be causing a problem. We do not keep our vegetable scraps in the house long enough to cause odors and we rinse/wash the container after emptying it. This is just for collection, so the contents get dumped into the bin in our tiny yard almost daily. For those with odor or maggot problems, these bins are not intended to actually create the compost, only to collect the materials.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Well made and Handy
customer_reviews.text: Handy in the kitchen and takes up little counter space. Nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Robert (Buff) Leboeuf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great so far....takes up small counter space. handy for scrapes for garden compost
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Estilo - almost a 5
customer_reviews.text: I have rated it a little lower than normal - can't get the filter out to change it. If that could be remedied, I'd give it a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Caroll M.

customer_reviews.title: Does all it said it would. Stays clean with ...
customer_reviews.text: Does all it said it would. Stays clean with light rinsing and soap. No smell escaping as of yet, 2 months...Eventually will look to get charcoal filter replacements
customer_reviews.author: Wolfrivers

customer_reviews.title: so good. Holds enough for two days of juicing with ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Holds enough for two days of juicing with no odors or gnats that we've seen. Fits nicely on our counter top. Easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: misskick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, doesn't shout on counter, but blends in; holds a LOT. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rittenhouse

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The 2 filters are really just one filter in two parts, you have to use both. Every time I open it a swarm of fruit flies comes out. We've been trying to empty it when its only half full, but the bugs are still a problem. It's disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Extra filter? Access to filter compartment in lid?
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that the void space for the filter in the lid is not accessible by opening or separating the lid, so the filter has to be wedged however through one of the small ventilation openings. Also the extra? filter is a square smaller unfitted filter that seems to serve to snug up the round thinner one. Otherwise the handle and the container are a convenient size but not sure based on the inconsistent "sheen" that the stainless is of high quality. Never had nor seen one of these though so have no baseline. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Tara D. Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: So far ok.
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this a little over a week which makes it difficult to judge long term. I did only see one filter already installed, no extra in the box. No odor from the variety of items put in the compost pail. I would recommend putti. ng something on the handle of the pail so that it does not cut into your hand. I am pleased so far with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Walking Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Good size but hard to keep fingerprints from not showing
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the handle. It's just that every time you pick it up it leaves fingerprints so I wouldn't buy this again. Hard to keep clean on outside. Not sure if that filter ever starts to get stinky but if it does, it's seemingly impossible to change out!
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for all my veggie scraps that go into the compost bin. It is nice looking and with a filter as to help with the smell but so far no bad smell
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Fremont

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, but it's bigger than 1 gal
customer_reviews.text: The description says 1 gal. so I expected it to be smaller than most of the others. In reality, it is a little more than 1.4 gals. That was too big for my countertop. The construction is good; I'm sad it's too big for my space.
customer_reviews.author: JCKW

customer_reviews.title: Love my compost pail
customer_reviews.text: This pail works so well to hold my compost on my kitchen counter until I am ready to bring it outside to my big compost pile. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H. Pallozzi

customer_reviews.title: compost pail
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. It saves me the chore of running out to my large compost bin in the yard every time I have a small amount of peels.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. Collom

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a few weeks now, so far, so good. I had a ceramic one previously with an I smooth interior which would catch food constantly and became a breeding ground for fruit flies no matter how many times I washed it. Thankfully this looks like it will avoid that problem. Nice color, doesn't get fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: Himerelda

customer_reviews.title: I love it but can’t open the top to change the filter.
customer_reviews.text: Came with no instructions. I cannot open the top to change the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed, but it is a huge compost pail and ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with scratches and only one filter. Kind of disappointed, but it is a huge compost pail and is in fact stainless steel. If it came new (not scratched) with two filters as described, I'd say five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want to buy. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the one you want to buy. I had the ceramic one, but I dropped it and it broke. It was heavy and had a lip on the bowl so it was harder to clean. This unit is light weight and hold more and no lip on the bowl. I did notice some very small flies which leaked out the top, so I put a rubber band around the top and it seals tight now.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas A. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - nice craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stainless steel pail with handle and lid with carbon filter. It’s a nice addition to my kitchen counter. Works well with perfectly fitting lid.
customer_reviews.author: graybeard

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product. The steel is a good weight and it is nice looking. It is a good size for me because I don’t have to empty it a lot since it’s just me. I am curious how well the filters will work in the heat of the summer, though! This year, the fruit flies were crazy in my kitchen WITHOUT the compost.
customer_reviews.author: Yrofthetiger

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what wanted
customer_reviews.text: The product came in a timely manor and was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C Richard Parr

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it's a stainless steel bucket. Actually, the odor filter does work -- it sits in the counter til it's full and then it's carried out, no issues with odor.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Bridge

customer_reviews.title: compost pail
customer_reviews.text: I like this because of the filters it has, but was a little disappointed in that the lid is not real tight. but it does the job, so I'll keep it
customer_reviews.author: bestoftimes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with how nice this compost bucket is. Good quality stainless steel, fairly heavy. No dents or scratches. Matches stainless kitchen appliances well. Has a filter for the top. Very pleased, highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: agj

customer_reviews.title: When I saw this at my son's place I liked the design
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this at my son's place I liked the design. The stainless fits is nicely with other appliances on my kitchen counter. The filter in the lid keeps not only the odors but also the fruit flies contained. The size is perfect. I line the bucket with plastic bags (that veggies come in) - keeps the insides clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: chicago jo

customer_reviews.title: No odors.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. No odors, even after a week! Just don't leave the food scraps in too long because moldy stuff will grow, trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Qulting Kat

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. The only problem is that stainless steel shows water marks.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: My compsting wife could not be happier. Looks much better on our counter
customer_reviews.text: My compsting wife could not be happier. Looks much better on our counter, too, than the old plastic one. Charcoal filter really works well, too. Zero odors.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Needs filters
customer_reviews.text: I like it, can't say I am crazy about it, for the simple reason that I can't see the need for the holes, it isn't that big that you won't have to empty it almost daily, so there is no smell developing. Eventually you need to buy new filters to block out those holes and that's just another thing to think about and buy. Not overly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne potvin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to your kitchen that blends in with sinks and appliances.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Love my pail!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my pail!!! I have needed something like this for a long long time. It looks nice sitting on the counter too. No my little fruit flies is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. The container is a great size and doesn't look out of place on a kitchen counter. The lid fits well and the shape of the container makes removing the contents easy. We use compostable bags with the container and could't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been impressed with this Quality is top notch! I can go a week or more before taking it to the flower bed. No odor and looks great on the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compost bin
customer_reviews.text: Attractive sitting on my counter; big enough to hold a lot of scraps but not so big as to be obtrusive. Contains all odors very well
customer_reviews.author: A.M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute little size but just big enough (and I eat a LOT of veggies), and the top with the filter is absolutely fantastic! I forget that it's even there on my counter top (yes, my counter top), until I take the top off.
customer_reviews.author: Kate D

customer_reviews.title: Good size for the counter
customer_reviews.text: Works well, does not smell. Good size for the counter. Can hold quite a few full #4 coffee filters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, fewer trips to compost pile outdoors
customer_reviews.text: use it every day for making compost. Nice size, fewer trips to compost pile outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: chickie

customer_reviews.title: No stink
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to do. Nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Look no further, get this one, easy to clean and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so great. It is lightweight and keeps odors contained. I can't speak to how long it lasts but so far we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Christie

customer_reviews.title: the bin is working out great. Easy to carry and clean
customer_reviews.text: So far, the bin is working out great. Easy to carry and clean. I only wish the seal would be a bit tighter, because it does attract fruit flies.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerlily

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and keeps the smell at bay when you're a little forgetful about bringing it out to the compost pile.
customer_reviews.author: Leeanimal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The filter component is spot on. I never smell my scraps!
customer_reviews.author: sara newton

customer_reviews.title: love it! holds lots of compost and looks so ...
customer_reviews.text: love it! holds lots of compost and looks so nice on the counter!
customer_reviews.author: S. Pyle

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Compost Bin
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on our new counter. The smell is nonexistent, unlike our old ice cream bucket. Really got it to spruce up our newly remodeled kitchen, but wish we had gotten it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: I really like this pail however I'm not sure how to replace ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pail however I'm not sure how to replace the filter when I may need to?
customer_reviews.author: marion artner

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for storing kitchen scraps before they're dumped into our ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for storing kitchen scraps before they're dumped into our compost bin. It's also very easy to clean. I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: RoccFam

customer_reviews.title: Beware! You might not get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The composter seems to work okay after using it for a week. However, i was very disappointed that the product didn't come with 2 carbon filters as stated in the description. That was one of the factors that made me decide to get this one. Can't give it a good reading when you don't get what was promised and paid for.
customer_reviews.author: tjvarnadoe

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to any kitchen! Composting is so much easier with this model and it is large enough to take a few days worth if contents. I used to make daily trips to the outside "real" compost pile and it was a hassle. I highly recommend this for those wanting to reduce oders and fruit flies in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: 50 year old Dude

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I suppose this is OK for the price. It's better than the plastic coffee cans I was using, but it does not appear to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: steve

product_meta.title: Estilo Stainless Steel Compost Pail, 1 Gallon Compost Bin, 2 Free Odor Absorbing Filters Included
product_meta.description: Our Estilo Stainless Steel Compost Pail provides temporary storage for fruit & vegetable peels, eggshells, coffee grounds, tea bags and other kitchen scraps to transfer to garden composter.
feature_bullets: A stylish environmental solution for recycling your kitchen waste for composting
Convenient size and sleek stainless steel design for everyday counter-top use
Charcoal filters prevent odors from escaping (2 included). Smooth interior walls prevent foods and liquids from building up. Won't leach chemicals into your compost
Rotating handle for easy carrying and emptying

Holds approximately 1 gallon of waste. Dimensions: 7.2 inch diameter x 11 inch high. Body height: 8.6 Inch. Dishwasher safe for easy cleaning (remove filters). Use the following ASIN for purchasing a new replacement filters: B00X6FPVCS

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars141 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
